alert.note: Alert for Brooks (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 7:17PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Brooks County through 800 PM EDT... At 716 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Pavo, or 11 miles north of Quitman. This storm was drifting south. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morven and Barney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
